text: Ara tara bale, apanara anugatya kari. Atahpara apanara nikata theke beriye gele'i tadera madhya theke ke'u ke'u paramarsa kare ratera belaya se kathara paripanthi ya tara apanara sathe balechila. Ara allaha likhe nena, se saba paramarsa ya tara kare thake. Sutaram apani tadera byapare nisprhata abalambana karuna ebam bharasa karuna allahara upara, allaha halena yathesta o karyasampadanakari.
